title: Border Ghost Stories
author: Pease, Howard
snippet: As they slowly ascended by the skirts of Peel Fell Meg broke the silenceagain.

title: Border Ghost Stories
author: Pease, Howard
snippet: So with a taste of sour ale in their mouths man and wife rode forth fromHawick the airt of Peel Fell.
